column2: onto the 5-star part of the review.  The deep-dish pizza?  Nothing short of the best pizza I've have had.  At first bite
column3: I thought it was too much tomato sauce
column4: but after I took a few more bites
column5: the crust came into play and complimented the sauce perfectly.  Seriously
column6: I know Chicago deep-dish pizza is popular and all
column8: THIS IS SOME GOOD A** PIZZA!  Too keep this review from running too long
column9: just do yourself a favor and put this restaurant in your itinerary if you ever are in Chicago!
